    • Uses of ProtocolHandlerChain in org.apache.james.protocols.api.handler

      Classes in org.apache.james.protocols.api.handler that implement ProtocolHandlerChain 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractProtocolHandlerChain
      Abstract base class for ProtocolHandlerChain implementations
      class  ProtocolHandlerChainImpl
      AbstractProtocolHandlerChain which is mutable till the ProtocolHandlerChainImpl.wireExtensibleHandlers() is called.

    • Uses of ProtocolHandlerChain in org.apache.james.protocols.lmtp

      Classes in org.apache.james.protocols.lmtp that implement ProtocolHandlerChain 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LMTPProtocolHandlerChain
      Special SMTPProtocolHandlerChain sub-class which should be used to build the chain for LMTP.

      Classes in org.apache.james.protocols.smtp that implement ProtocolHandlerChain 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SMTPProtocolHandlerChain
      This ProtocolHandlerChain implementation add all needed handlers to the chain to act as full blown SMTPServer.
